content: ws as follows row 4 k row 5 k2 kfb k1 k1 *k1 return both sts to the left needle and k2tog row 6 k tbl repeat from * to end row 7 k2 m1 k3 6sts row 8 k row 9 k to last 3sts m1 k3 finishing row 10 k3 p to last 3sts k3 row 11-18 repeat row 9-10 four more times 11sts weave in all ends and soak the shawl before blocking quite aggresively pin all sides with straight work row 1-18 of chart a / written version a once edges and leave to dry completely 20sts protected under uk copyright 2020 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only contact verilyknits@gmail com anivia 2 protected under uk copyright 2020 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only contact verilyknits@gmail com a trahc anivia 3 protected under uk copyright 2020 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only contact verilyknits@gmail com b trahc anivia 4 written version a written version b row 1 rs k3 k2tog yo k3 m1 k3 row 1 rs k5 *yo ssk k2 repeat from * to last 3sts row 2 and all ws row k3 p to last 3sts k3 m1 k3 row 3 k5 yo ssk k2 m1 k3 row 2 and all ws row k3 p to last 3sts k3 row 5 k6 yo ssk k2 m1 k3 row 3 k6 *yo ssk k2 repeat from * to last 3sts m1 row 7 k7 yo ssk k2 m1 k3 k3 row 9 k8 yo ssk k2 m1 k3 row 5 k7 *yo ssk k2 repeat from * to last 3sts m1 row 11 k6 k2tog yo k2 k2tog yo k1 m1 k3 k3 row 13 k5 k2tog yo k2 k2tog yo k3 m1 k3 row 7 k8 *yo ssk k2 repeat from * to last 3sts m1 row 15 k4 k2tog yo k2 twice k2tog yo k1 k3 m1 k3 row 9 k6 *k2tog yo k2 repeat from * to last 6sts row 17 k3 k2tog yo k2 twice k2tog yo k3 k2tog yo k1 m1 k3 m1 k3 row 11 k5 *k2tog yo k2 repeat from * to last 4sts row 18 k3 p to last 3sts k3 k1 m1 k3 row 13 k4 *k2tog yo k2 repeat from * to last 6sts k2tog yo k1 m1 k3 row 15 k3 *k2tog yo k2 repeat from * to last 4sts k1 m1 k3 row 16 k3 p to last 3sts k3 protected under uk copyright 2020 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only contact verilyknits@gmail com
